name: Microservices Architecture Design v2
content:
Microservices Architecture Design v2

Overview:

Technical design document for the next generation of SynergyOS microservices architecture.

Architecture Goals:

  • Scalability

    • Handle 10x current load

    • Auto-scaling support

  • Reliability

    • 99.99% uptime

    • Fault tolerance

  • Maintainability

    • Independent deployments

    • Monitoring & observability

Core Services:

  1. Authentication Service

    • JWT-based auth

    • OAuth2 integration

    • Role-based access

  2. User Service

    • Profile management

    • Preferences

    • Activity tracking

  3. Content Service

    • Document storage

    • Version control

    • Search indexing

  4. Analytics Service

    • Usage metrics

    • Performance data

    • Business insights

Technology Stack:

  • Backend

    • Node.js / TypeScript

    • Go (performance-critical)

  • Data Storage

    • PostgreSQL

    • Redis

    • Elasticsearch

  • Infrastructure

    • Kubernetes

    • Docker

    • AWS

Communication:

  1. Synchronous

    • REST APIs

    • gRPC

  2. Asynchronous

    • Kafka

    • RabbitMQ

Security Measures:

  • Service mesh (Istio)

  • mTLS encryption

  • API gateway security

  • Rate limiting

Monitoring & Logging:

  • Prometheus metrics

  • ELK stack

  • Jaeger tracing

  • Grafana dashboards

Deployment Strategy:

  1. CI/CD Pipeline

    • GitHub Actions

    • ArgoCD

  2. Release Process

    • Canary deployments

    • Blue-green updates
